verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor A Psalm לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid; of David יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD רֹ֝עִ֗י <WH7462> ro-'I, [is] my shepherd לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo shall not אֶחְסָֽר׃ <WH2637> 'ech-Sar. I shall not want

בִּנְא֣וֹת <WH4999> bin-'ot pastures דֶּ֭שֶׁא <WH1877> De-she in green יַרְבִּיצֵ֑נִי <WH7257> yar-bi-Tze-ni; He maketh me to lie down עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- beside מֵ֖י <WH4325> mei waters מְנֻח֣וֹת <WH4496> me-nu-Chot me beside the still יְנַהֲלֵֽנִי׃ <WH5095> ye-na-ha-Le-ni. he leadeth

נַפְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> naf-Shi my soul יְשׁוֹבֵ֑ב <WH7725> ye-sho-Vev; He restoreth יַֽנְחֵ֥נִי <WH5148> yan-Che-ni he leadeth בְמַעְגְּלֵי־ <WH4570> ve-ma'-ge-lei- me in the paths צֶ֝֗דֶק <WH6664> Tze-dek, of righteousness לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an sake שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> she-Mo. for his name's

גַּ֤ם <WH1571> gam Even כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- though אֵלֵ֨ךְ <WH1980> 'e-Lech walk בְּגֵ֪יא <WH1516> be-Gei through the valley צַלְמָ֡וֶת <WH6757> tzal-Ma-vet of the shadow of death לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- no אִ֘ירָ֤א <WH3372> 'i-Ra I will fear רָ֗ע <WH7451> Ra', no evil כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- though אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you עִמָּדִ֑י <WH5978> 'im-ma-Di; me שִׁבְטְךָ֥ <WH7626> shiv-te-Cha for thou [art] with me thy rod וּ֝מִשְׁעַנְתֶּ֗ךָ <WH4938> u-mish-'an-Te-cha, and thy staff הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah they יְנַֽחֲמֻֽנִי׃ <WH5162> ye-Na-cha-Mu-ni. they comfort

תַּעֲרֹ֬ךְ <WH6186> ta-'a-Roch Thou preparest לְפָנַ֨י׀ <WH6440> le-fa-Nai before שֻׁלְחָ֗ן <WH7979> shul-Chan, a table נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> Ne-ged the presence צֹרְרָ֑י <WH6887> tzo-re-Rai; me in the presence of mine enemies דִּשַּׁ֖נְתָּ <WH1878> dish-Shan-ta thou anointest בַשֶּׁ֥מֶן <WH8081> vash-She-men with oil רֹ֝אשִׁ֗י <WH7218> ro-Shi, my head כּוֹסִ֥י <WH3563> ko-Si my cup רְוָיָֽה׃ <WH7310> re-va-Yah. runneth over

אַ֤ךְ׀ <WH389> 'ach Surely ט֤וֹב <WH2896> Tov Surely goodness וָחֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> va-Che-sed and mercy יִ֭רְדְּפוּנִי <WH7291> Yir-de-fu-ni shall follow כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> ye-Mei me all the days חַיָּ֑י <WH2416> chai-Yai; of my life וְשַׁבְתִּ֥י <WH3427> ve-shav-Ti and I will dwell בְּבֵית־ <WH1004> be-veit- in the house יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD לְאֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> le-'O-rech forever יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> ya-Mim. the days
